name: Pole Patrol
description:
FIXED TO ALLOW KEYBOARD SUPPORT

- CONTROLS BELOW -

Created taking part in the Yogscast Game Jam 2019!

DONALD TRUMP has come to dump all of his garbage onto the North Pole - an act which will surely ruin Christmas!!

In a desperate plea for aid, Santa has sent postcards far and wide. 

One to Four unlikely heroes have answered his call...

Defeat Donald Trump using his only weakness - The true spirit of Christmas!

Beware the water....

NOTES:

This game supports 1-4 controllers!  Can also be played single player  with a keyboard!

Download, unzip and run YOGSJAM Pole Patrol.exe!

Navigate the Start menu with the d-pad, select options with A.

CONTROLS:

KEYBOARD:

Start Menu: WASD / Arrow Keys to navigate menu,  Space Bar / Enter to select.  Esc to exit tutorial

Game: WASD / Arrows to control character / Cannon, Space Bar / Enter to interact / Fire cannon.  Left CTRL to slide

CONTROLLER:

Start Menu:  D-Pad up & down, Left & right in tutorial to select buttons, A to press button, B to exit tutorial.

Game: Any button on a connected controller to join.  Left analog stick to move, B to slide, X to pick up bags and place at igloo, X to enter igloo, Right analog stick forward/back to aim cannon down/up,  Right analog stick left/right to turn cannon left/right, Right trigger to fire cannon.
